title: 47. Should We Trust Hospital Rankings?
description: Hospitals compete for prime spots on the U.S. News rankings — but could those lists be doing more harm than good?
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Hospitals compete for prime spots on the U.S. News rankings — but could those lists be doing more harm than good?
